item.title: Reading
item.description: Some books I enjoyed reading The Dawn of Everything, David Graeber Form, Function & Design, Paul Jacques Grillo Company of One, Paul Jarvis Atomic Habits, James Clear No Is Not Enough, Naomi Klein Walkable City, Jeff Speck Quiet, Susan Cain Ace, Angela Chen An Entangled Life, Merlin Sheldrake The Death and Life of Great American Cities, Jane Jacobs Some people who make content I value

item.title: A Stroll through the Internet
item.description: What would a stroll through the internet be? I think the scenery should be nice. A light breeze, some rays of sunlight, a nip in the air.

item.title: Well-worn Software
item.description: What would software look like if it aged? Imagine a computing interface that became less and less “new” the more you used it.
